definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
vascular cambium (layer of tissue responsible for growth inside wood)

sentences.english: Litter in the barn has bedded down.
sentences.chinese: 铺在马厩里的草已粘结成层。

sentences.english: Natural stratum is distributed mostly in stratification.
sentences.chinese: 天然地层大多数情况下都是成层分布的。

sentences.english: The vertical structure of community is relatively complicated and its supraterraneous stratification is remarkable.
sentences.chinese: 群落垂直结构复杂，地上成层明显。

sentences.english: Later, it became fashionable to coat the tiered cake with icing.
sentences.chinese: 后来则演变出在成层蛋糕外覆盖糖霜的风气。

sentences.english: All eutectics do not grow to produce lamellar structures.
sentences.chinese: 并非所有的共晶体都生长成层片状结构。

sentences.english: The lay of the strata can imply that the rock splits easily along its direction of cleavage .
sentences.chinese: 成层的地层意味着岩石易于沿着其解理方向裂开。

sentences.english: The community's vertical structure is complicated, and supraterraneous stratification is clearly determined.
sentences.chinese: 群落垂直结构复杂，地上成层明显。

sentences.english: Finally, dynamic compliances of a pile with variable impedance embedded in layered saturated soil are studied.
sentences.chinese: 成层土中变阻抗桩纵向振动理论研究。

sentences.english: Litter in the pig sty has bedded down.
sentences.chinese: 铺在猪圈里的草已粘结成层了。

definition: holocene system (geological strata laid down during the last 12000 years)
a block/body of person or animal as a block
